text: Shen Jian (; born 14 May 1975) is a Chinese gymnast. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, winning a silver medal in men's team competition. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of China Category:Olympic silver medalists for China Category:Gymnasts at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the World Artistic Gymnastics Championships
title: Shen Jian
